headerSubText.value: Read what our satisfied customers have to say about our exceptional cleaning services.
headerSubText.instructions: A short description of the section goes here. Should talk about what people are saying about the company.

value.body: Excellent service and does an awesome job....very lucky to have them for our cleaning.
Extremely professional. Did a great job and at a very reasonable rate. I highly recommend Hutchison Maintenance.
Great cleaning service, left my house shining before going up for sale.
Brandi and her team are always fantastic to work with. They are efficient and still very meticulous.
Tyler did my windows and they are gorgeous!  Great work! Great price!
Tyler did my windows and they are gorgeous!  Great work! Great price!

testimonials.instructions: Use available information to create 2-6 testimonials in the testimonials array. Use the provided icon for all authors

example.body: The body for the first testimonial goes here. It should be a short paragraph about what the person is saying about the company.

author.name: Name of the first person
author.source: Source of the review. For example, Google, Facebook, etc.
